summary: Design and build an official-style, 4K responsive web UI/UX for 'India Post IT 2.0 (Begumganj)' with a Dark Luxury aesthetic, interactive dashboard modals for postal schemes, integrated calculators, and an animated BPM profile section.
architectural_notes: UI/UX target: official-style website with 4K responsive layout and GPU-accelerated transitions.
Design system: Dark Luxury palette (#0D0D0D base, #FF3131 neon red, #D4AF37 metallic gold) and frosted-glass surfaces.
Interaction pattern: click-to-open frosted-glass modal (25px blur) with consistent 4-tab information architecture across schemes.
Dashboard uses 3D floating glossy icons; scheme content includes 2026 rates/benefits and document checklists.
Embedded calculators require real-time updates from slider and manual input.
Profile card should use a real profile image asset (not just a placeholder); support swapping the image via a static file reference in the frontend.
Ensure high-contrast typography on Dark Luxury theme (no black text on dark backgrounds); standardize to white/near-white text and adjust styling for a more official/government-site feel.
SSA scheme iconography requirement updated: use a small girl visual instead of piggy bank for Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana card/icon.
Live calculator deposit amount input: when input background is white/light, ensure high-contrast text (requested: red) for readability.
Add a dedicated Call action (tel:7771991108) as a bottom-positioned icon/button with a subtle live/animated indicator; separate from WhatsApp CTA.
known_issues: Some text appears black on dark background causing low contrast/readability; needs switching to white/near-white and overall styling refinement for official look.
Live calculator deposit amount input currently shows white text on a white background, making the entered value unreadable.

existing_features.title: Create a 4K-optimized, fully responsive landing/dashboard page for ‚ÄúIndia Post IT 2.0‚Äù with an official-style ‚ÄúDark Luxury‚Äù UI: Matte Black (#0D0D0D) base, Neon Red (#FF3131) and Metallic Gold (#D4AF37) accents, frosted-glass surfaces, and GPU-accelerated transitions.

Add a cinematic full-screen background layer that plays a looping video (autoplay, muted, inline) behind the UI, with graceful fallback (poster image + dark gradient) when video cannot play. The background should visually suggest: a 3D vintage brass India Post seal on red wax morphing into a glowing biometric fingerprint scan, settling into a dark ambient tech loop.
Implement the header as a frosted-glass bar containing: (1) title text ‚ÄúIndia Post IT 2.0‚Äù, and (2) a location pill with exact text ‚ÄúB.O: Mundla Chawal | S.O: Begumganj‚Äù.

Build the scheme dashboard with six high-gloss, floating, 3D-styled interactive icons/cards for: SB, SSA, RD, MIS, TD, and PLI/RPLI. Map each scheme to the specified visual metaphor: SB = 3D Digital Hourglass; SSA = Golden 3D Piggy Bank with sparkling crown; RD = 3D Spiral Staircase of coins; MIS = 3D Wall Clock emitting gold coins; TD = 3D Golden Vault/Safe; PLI/RPLI = Pulsing 3D Metallic Shield.

Implement the universal ‚ÄúClick system‚Äù: clicking any scheme icon opens a transparent frosted-glass modal dialog with blur set to 25px (or the closest equivalent across browsers), including proper focus trapping, ESC-to-close, and click-outside-to-close behavior.

Inside each scheme modal, add a crisp white 4-tab navigation with the following tabs and content structure: Tab 1 ‚ÄúHistory‚Äù (evolution and purpose), Tab 2 ‚ÄúEligibility‚Äù (age/residency/limits), Tab 3 ‚ÄúBenefits‚Äù (interest rates (2026), tax rebates (80C), maturity perks), Tab 4 ‚ÄúDocuments‚Äù (KYC and specific forms checklist). Provide content as editable, data-driven copy per scheme (e.g., a single TypeScript config file) so it can be updated without changing components.

Add an embedded ‚ÄúLive 2026 Calculator‚Äù section within every scheme modal that includes (1) an interactive slider and (2) a manual input box. The calculator must update results instantly as inputs change. If exact scheme formulas/interest tables are not provided, implement a clearly labeled generic calculator model per scheme with configurable rate/tenure fields stored in the same scheme data config.

Create the ‚ÄúBPM Prabal Pratap‚Äù profile card with the specified unique animation: a minimalist profile card with circular photo and subtle glow; on click, the card expands and dissolves into a frosted-glass overlay; the photo slides up from the bottom-left; the bio-data and designation type out with a neon-red cursor effect; the background behind the bio fades slightly to focus attention.

Add the vertical right-edge motto text as a glowing neon element with exact content: ‚ÄúDEDICATED TO THE SERVICE OF THE NATION üáÆüá≥‚Äù. It must remain visible without overlapping core content and adapt for mobile (e.g., collapse to a smaller pinned element if needed).

Implement UX & support elements: (1) an infinite horizontal marquee of testimonials, and (2) a floating, 3D-styled, glowing red WhatsApp button fixed to bottom-right that uses the number 7771991108 (e.g., wa.me link) and remains above other UI while not blocking modal close controls.
Add required static assets (generated images + video) to the frontend as static files and reference them directly from the UI (do not route images/video through the backend).

Use the uploaded image file "prabalpratapimageIMG_20260212_140728.png" as the profile picture for the "BPM Prabal Pratap" profile card by converting it into the static asset expected by the UI ("/assets/generated/profile-prabal-pratap.dim_1024x1024.png") and ensuring it displays correctly in both the compact card and the expanded overlay.

Audit the entire frontend UI and replace any low-contrast dark/black text that appears on dark backgrounds with high-contrast white/near-white text (or appropriate theme tokens), ensuring all content is clearly readable across the landing page, scheme cards, modals, calculator, profile card, testimonials, motto, and footer.

Refine the visual styling to feel more like an official government site while keeping the existing Dark Luxury theme: standardize typography hierarchy, reduce excessive glow intensity where it harms legibility, and adjust spacing/borders to look cleaner and more formal.

Replace the Sukanya Samriddhi Account (SSA) scheme icon from the piggy bank image to a small girl image across the dashboard card and anywhere else the scheme icon is shown by updating the SSA `iconPath` in `frontend/src/data/schemes.ts` to point to the new static asset.

Adjust the Live 2026 Calculator styling so that any text rendered on light/white background areas uses black (or near-black) text for readability, and add a subtle ‚Äúlive‚Äù animation to the changing result value so users can see it updating when inputs change.

Add a new clickable ‚ÄúIT 2.0‚Äù icon in the header; when clicked, open a dedicated modal/panel containing IT 2.0 information. The modal must be dismissible (close button + ESC + click outside) and must use English text.

Update the Live 2026 Calculator deposit amount manual input so the entered value is always readable: change the input text color to Neon Red (#FF3131) (and ensure caret/placeholder are also readable) even when the input background appears light/white.

Add a bottom-positioned Call action UI (call icon with a subtle live/pulsing animation) that displays the phone number 7771991108 and initiates a phone call on click using a tel: link (tel:7771991108).

Update the header "IT 2.0" pill/button (the clickable IT 2.0 box in the top header that opens the IT 2.0 modal) to use a dark red background treatment so it visually reads as a more official/government-style element while preserving existing layout, click behavior, and accessibility.

Remove the footer attribution text/link that reads ‚ÄúBuilt with ‚Ä¶ using caffeine.ai‚Äù (including the heart icon and the external link to caffeine.ai) so it is no longer displayed anywhere in the UI.
